content:
I have copied the prompt into Spyder and wrote the code that works in it. However, after I moved the same code back to the Finger Exercise input box, the test always gave an error of "SyntaxError: 'return' outside function" no matter how I modified the indentations. I am attaching the screenshots here, and I am wondering if that is the issue with my code or the test system.

Thank you!
subject: Finger Exercises 5 - Test Result Question

content:
I can't tell from the screenshot, but make sure that you haven't mixed spaces and tabs. Sometimes that can happen when copying from one editor to another.

Edit: I noticed that you didn't copy in the whole function into the catsoop checker, only the body. Copying in the whole function should work.
